about_the_game:
Dive into the fascinating world of puzzles and anime aesthetics with the game Summer Waifu! This is a unique game for puzzle and anime lovers, where you can enjoy the summer atmosphere and charming characters.

Game Features

  • 30 levels with unique puzzles

Each level offers a new picture with anime girls, made in a summer theme. You have to collect them piece by piece to reveal all the details of their beauty and charisma. The levels become more difficult as you progress, which makes the game interesting for both beginners and experienced puzzle lovers.

  • Gallery of completed puzzles

Each completed puzzle is saved in the gallery, where you can enjoy your progress at any time. The gallery turns into a collection of beautiful illustrations that you can admire again and again.

  • Achievement System

Get rewards for your successes! Complete various tasks, such as completing all levels of the game. Achievements add an extra element of motivation and allow you to be proud of your successes.

  • Simple and intuitive controls

The game has a user-friendly interface. Just drag the puzzle pieces to the right places and enjoy the process!

  • Summer atmosphere and anime aesthetics

Colorful graphics, bright characters and summer mood will make the time spent in the game unforgettable. Each anime girl is unique and has her own personality, which makes the assembly process even more exciting.

Who is this game for?

Summer Waifu is an ideal choice for everyone who loves puzzles, anime and relaxing games. It is suitable for both those who want to have a good time and for players who want to test their skills and reach new heights.

Collect puzzles, unlock achievements and create your own collection of charming anime illustrations in Summer Waifu!
